mapper.insert:
select site_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into site_comment(site_comment_no,site_comment_content,site_comment_date,member_no,site_no) values(#{siteCommentNo},#{siteCommentContent},sysdaye,#{memberNo},#{siteNo})
mapper.delete: delete from site_comment where member_no=#{memberNo} and site_no=#{siteNo}
mapper.select: select site_comment_content , site_comment_date from site_comment where site_no=#{siteNo}
